title: How do I not see my cloud photos on my device?
content:
Hello,

Once a picture on my Pixel 3 is backed up, I no longer want to see it on my phone.   

I don't want to see my photos from Google Cloud on my phone once they are backed up. 

I read the thread about deleting photos - and if the option to delete from the device is not there, then they are uploaded and you are viewing them from the cloud.

How do I turn off seeing photos from the cloud on my phone?

Suggestions?

Thanks,

V
